title: BRIEF-Ericsson wins cash suite order
text:
BRIEF-Ericsson wins cash suite order Sept 22 
Sept 22 Telefonaktiebolaget L M Ericsson 
* Ericsson Order to Cash suite consisting of Charging System, Ericsson Multi Mediation and Multi Activation software will be deployed in all MTN networks. 
* Ericsson will also provide Support Services and Managed Services for the suite Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Johan Ahlander) Trending On Reuters
